# Government Tender Announcement
### Barcode Scanners

#### Tender Details

* **Solicitation Number:** WS3991522410
* **Publication Date:** 2023-06-29
* **Tender Closing Date:** July 14, 2023, 2:00 PM EDT
* **Amendment Date:** July 12, 2023
* **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

#### Procurement Information

* **Procurement Category:** Goods
* **Trade Agreements:** Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)

#### Technical Specifications

* **UNSpsc Codes:***43211519, *43211701, *43211729
* **Description:** Electronic Reader or E-Reader, Barcode Reader Equipment, Optical Mark Reader

#### Tender Status
* **Tender Status:** Expiré

#### Contract Information
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** None
* **Expected Contract End Date:** None

#### Supporting Information
* **End-User Entities:** Department of Employment and Social Development (ESDC)
* **Contact Information:** Stanley Chui (PSPC/SPAC)
	+ Email: [stanley.chui@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:stanley.chui@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
	+ Phone: None
	+ Fax: None
	+ Address: None

#### Accessing Tender Documents
* **Notice URL:** http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16729404?extsite=MTY3Mjk0MDRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
